generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, bordered by metal railings and where pedestrians are walking, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and commercial signage are visible along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the sidewalk and between the road and buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Two pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the sidewalk, including a silver car and a black car.
- truck: A white truck is visible parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue parking sign (P) and a white sign with a blue circle and a black "P" symbol.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including a blue pole on the left side of the road and poles supporting traffic signs and lights.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the left side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the street.
- terrain: There is a small patch of grass visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
